verses.verse: Then we <S%H6437>turned<s%>, and took our <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H5437>me<s%>; and we compassed <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
Ye have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> long <S%H7227>enough<s%>: <S%H6437>turn<s%> you <S%H6828>northward<s%>.

And <S%H6680>command<s%> thou the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye are to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H1366>border<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>; and they will be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H3966>you<s%>: take ye good heed unto yourselves <S%H8104>therefore<s%>;

contend <S%H1624><s%> not with <S%H5414>them<s%>; for I will not give you of their <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H4096>no<s%>, not so much as for the sole of the <S%H7272>foot<s%> to tread <S%H5414>on<s%>; because I have given <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H7666>purchase<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> of them for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that ye may <S%H398>eat<s%>; and ye shall also <S%H3739>buy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of them for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that ye may <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; he hath <S%H3045>known<s%> thy <S%H3212>walking<s%> through this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: these <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath been with <S%H2637>thee<s%>; thou hast lacked <S%H1697>nothing<s%>.

So we <S%H5674>passed<s%> by from our <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> from <S%H359>Elath<s%> and from <S%H6100>Ezion-geber<s%>. And we <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6696>me<s%>, Vex not <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, neither <S%H1624>contend<s%> with them in <S%H4421>battle<s%>; for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> thee of his <S%H776>land<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>; because I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>.
(The <S%H368>Emim<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein <S%H6440>aforetime<s%>, a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%>, and <S%H7311>tall<s%>, as the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%>:
these <S%H1992><s%> also are <S%H2803>accounted<s%> <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>, as the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%>; but the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H368>Emim<s%>.

The <S%H2752>Horites<s%> also <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H6440>aforetime<s%>, but the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> <S%H8045>them<s%>; and they destroyed them from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>, and dwelt in their <S%H3478>stead<s%>; as Israel <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H3425>possession<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave unto <S%H5414>them<s%>.)
Now rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, and get you <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered<s%>. And we went <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered<s%>.

And the <S%H3117>days<s%> in which we <S%H1980>came<s%> from <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%>, until we were come <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered<s%>, were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; until all the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> were <S%H8552>consumed<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> sware unto <S%H7650>them<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was against <S%H2000>them<s%>, to destroy them from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, until they were <S%H8552>consumed<s%>.
So it came to <S%H582>pass<s%>, when all the men of <S%H4421>war<s%> were <S%H8552>consumed<s%> and <S%H4191>dead<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>,
that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
Thou <S%H6144>art<s%> this day to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%>, the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>:

and when thou comest <S%H7126>nigh<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, <S%H6696>vex<s%> them <S%H1624>not<s%>, nor contend with <S%H5414>them<s%>; for I will not give thee of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>; because I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>.

(That also is <S%H2803>accounted<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>: <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein <S%H6440>aforetime<s%>; but the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H2157>Zamzummim<s%>,

a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%>, and <S%H7311>tall<s%>, as the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%>; but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>them<s%>; and they succeeded <S%H3427>them<s%>, and dwelt in their stead;

as he <S%H6213>did<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, when he <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> the <S%H2752>Horites<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>them<s%>; and they succeeded <S%H3427>them<s%>, and dwelt in their stead even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

and the <S%H5761>Avvim<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2699>villages<s%> as far as <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, the <S%H3732>Caphtorim<s%>, that came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H3731>Caphtor<s%>, <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>, and dwelt in their stead.)

Rise ye <S%H6965>up<s%>, take your <S%H5265>journey<s%>, and pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>: <S%H7200>behold<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and his <S%H776>land<s%>; <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1624>it<s%>, and contend with him in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

This <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of thee and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of thee upon the <S%H6440>peoples<s%> that are under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, who shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8088>report<s%> of <S%H7264>thee<s%>, and shall tremble, and be in <S%H2342>anguish<s%> because of <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through thy <S%H776>land<s%>: I will <S%H3212>go<s%> along by the <S%H1870>highway<s%>, I will <S%H5493>turn<s%> neither unto the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H7666>sell<s%> me <S%H400>food<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that I may <S%H398>eat<s%>; and <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that I may <S%H8354>drink<s%>: only let me pass <S%H5674>through<s%> on my <S%H7272>feet<s%>,

as the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6144>Ar<s%>, <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H5674>me<s%>; until I shall pass over the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> giveth <S%H5414>us<s%>.

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H3068>him<s%>; for Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7185>hardened<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and made his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H553>obstinate<s%>, that he might <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, Behold, I have <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> up <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2490>thee<s%>: begin to <S%H3423>possess<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H3423>inherit<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%>.
Then <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H5971>us<s%>, he and all his people, unto <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him up <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5221>us<s%>; and we smote <S%H1121>him<s%>, and his sons, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And we <S%H3920>took<s%> all his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> every <S%H4962>inhabited<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>; we <S%H7604>left<s%> none <S%H8300>remaining<s%>:
only the <S%H929>cattle<s%> we took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto <S%H7998>ourselves<s%>, with the spoil of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which we had <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

From <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and from the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, even unto <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, there was not a <S%H7151>city<s%> too <S%H7682>high<s%> for <S%H3068>us<s%>; Jehovah our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> up all before <S%H6440>us<s%>:

only to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> thou <S%H7126>camest<s%> not <S%H3027>near<s%>; all the side of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, and wheresoever <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> forbade <S%H6680>us<s%>.
